ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We would like to thank the members of the Laboratory of Biological Organic Chemistry of the University Felix Houphouet Boigny of Cocody (Côte d’Ivoire) and all the laboratory staff of Chemistry of Natural Molecules, University of Liege (Gembloux Agro-Bio Tech) for their scientific contribution particularly Danny Trisman, Saskia Sergeant, Thomas Bertrand, Franck Michels, Marie Davin, Laurie Josselin, Pierre-Yves Werrie and Clement Burgeon. We are also grateful to Felicien for his support.
